name: Battery Run (zaapp_mks)
description:
The main idea of this game was generated by ChatGPT. I wanted to make a simple and quick game in a weekend so after mixing and matching the generated ideas, I decided to proceed with a platforming game involving a robot that must navigate through an area filled with enemies but with a limited supply of energy which can be recharged by collecting batteries along the way. 

After adding more details to the prompt, ChatGPT also came up with the title and a suggestion to make the movement automatic similar to an endless runner game.

Lastly, I added an idea of mine which is to allow the robot to land on enemies to defeat them as well as recharge.

Controls:

Space to jump up to 3 times (YES! TRIPLE JUMP!)

Mechanics:

Try not to fall

Collect batteries to recharge

Land on enemies to defeat them and recharge

3D Assets:

Very cool free assets from Quaternius! :)

Environment and Enemies - https://quaternius.com/packs/cyberpunkgamekit.html

Robot Player - https://quaternius.com/packs/animatedrobot.html
